name: Mrbomberman
body:
### MrBomberman.
Welcome to the official page of MrBomberman!
MrBomberman is an advanced rts multiplayer engine, that handles any kind of custom game made from the MWorld Editor!

### Project Features
Includes the Game Client, the Universal MServer and the powerfull MWorld Editor.

### TODO list
Client:
- [Done] Authentification, Lobby, Chat
- [Done] Game creation interface
- [Done] Game lobby
- [Done] Game Interface
- [Done] Map loading

MServer:
- [Done] Hashtable serialization
- [Done] Game Rooms
- [Done] Pathfinder
- [Done] IA management

MWorld Editor
- [Done] Creating/Saving/Loading maps
- [Done] Map sculpting tool
- [Done] Texture/Color paint
- [Done] Fog of War
- [Done] Entities editor
- [Done] Skills editor
- Items editor

### Authors and Contributors
@MrNothing

### Support or Contact
If you have any questions about the project, contact me at boris1284@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
